answers.answer: Have you tried a daily multivitamin made for men?  This may help a great deal if taken regularly, in many aspects of your life.

depending on how old you are could be why you dont feel like having sex anymore. as far as your other symptoms go it sounds like yoyu are coming down with someth8ing and you shoyld go to your dr and get on an antibiotic.

Are you taking any medications? Simply because that can cause you to have certain side effects that can cause less energy, and most deffinetely lack of sexual desire. However, some symptoms fade over time or some may worsen.

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!The first thing to do is get the testosterone levels checked. Some common low testosterone symptoms are decrease in sex drive, ejaculation problems, shrinking testicle, fatigue, loss of body hair, difficulty gaining or maintaining muscle, depression, and loss of strength. A combination of any of these or all of these can happen.  With therapy there will be improvement in all these parameters with time.Other possibilities are diabetes, hypothyroidism, depression, severe anemia, stress and anxiety.Since I cannot examine you and know other related conditions you may be having, nor is a detailed history possible on net, I have listed the various possibilities that should be looked into. Please consult your PCP for primary examination followed by proper referral.Take care!

question: Just wanna know, what to do, as I am not feeling any vigour, energy, andalso facing lack of sexual desire these days.
title: Lack of energy, sexual desire
